sentences.english: At the end, he ground out the enormous "Biography of George Washington".
sentences.chinese: 最后，他苦心经营总算写成卷帙浩繁的《华盛顿传》。

sentences.english: The garment store they so painstakingly built up also ended in failure.
sentences.chinese: 他们苦心经营的服装商店也以失败而告终。
